Articles.Content:
Hi!

This small add-on adds to game RCS thruster propelled with Xenon.

Specific Impulse is small, because this uses ONLY Xenon, so the propellant isn't heated up by Electricity like in Ion propulsion system.

I hope you like the model and texture.

DOWNLOAD AND LICENCES

DOWNLOAD[1.0]

Edited October 14, 2014 by PatPL
This sounds pretty nifty for small ion probes. Thanks!
I can see this for times I need a little more than probes SAS to pull away from a mothership.
If they don't use electricity, why do they have electrical hazard signs?

If they don't use electricity, why do they have electrical hazard signs?

Static charge build-up perhaps? Ever use a CO2 fire extinguisher? Those things will put the zap on you sometimes when you shoot them, so maybe discharging raw xenon would do the same.
